alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:13PM CDT until July 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 613 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Camdenton, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Bennett Spring State Park, Bennett Springs, Eldridge and Sleeper. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 130 and 137. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
